file_insights.key_discovery: Simultaneous kills handled via killsThisCycle, with progressive combo increment and multi-kill bonus calculation
file_insights.performance_impact: High - ensures accurate combo tracking during rapid monster eliminations

file_insights.key_discovery: Comprehensive performance verification of combo system components with memory and frame drop prevention strategies
file_insights.performance_impact: Critical - validated performance across multiple game systems

patterns_discovered: Object pooling for particles (max 5 emitters per type)
Auto-cleanup of temporary game objects via tween onComplete callbacks
Event listeners removed in destroy() methods
Milestone tracking with bounded Set (max 10 entries)
gotchas_discovered: Potential memory leaks in particle and text object management
Risk of frame drops with excessive particle or text rendering
Performance degradation during extended gameplay sessions
recommendations: Use Chrome DevTools Performance tab to verify runtime performance
Take heap snapshots before and after long gameplay sessions
Monitor FPS, ensuring it stays consistently at or near 60
Check for any unexpected memory growth or detached DOM elements
